thread.title: Dog Chained To Wall For 8 Years Surprises Rescuers With Her Response
thread.title_full: Dog Chained To Wall For 8 Years Surprises Rescuers With Her Response

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Dog Chained To Wall For 8 Years Surprises Rescuers With Her Response
text:
Dog Chained To Wall For 8 Years Surprises Rescuers With Her Response   
Lola was in a musty garage, chained to the wall and had lived this life of neglect for 8 years until finally AMA Animal Rescue was able to rescue her from this prison and get her the urgent medical care she needed. This video shows how Lola began her path towards a happier life. And that journey is not yet over, as the sweet Pit Bull also needs a forever home! 
Please share Lolaâ€™s story and help her find a home.   Like Us On Facebook!
